author: William Ebbs
title: Will Coronavirus Be With Us Forever? American Experts Say It’s Possible
description: Coronavirus may be with us forever. Presidential adviser Dr. Fauci believes the deadly infection could become a seasonal disease. The post Will Coronavirus Be With Us Forever? American Experts Say It’s Possible appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Coronavirus may transition into a seasonal winter disease according to American scientists. This suggests that people who dont get infected in the first wave of the virus may face reinfection when it comes back in the future.
